As others have said, the material is not very thick and is a soft poly cotton blend with 5% spandex which helps to keep it shaped. True to size. I am 5’4” & length is at mid hip. Perfect with leggings or sweatpants to run errands to be comfortable  & still look neat!

I love this t-shirt.  When I opened it,  was surprised at how soft it was.  I tossed it to my boyfriend sitting across the room, he responded ‘wow that the softest shirt I’ve ever felt.’  He couldn’t believe I got it on Amazon.  Everything about this shirt is good.  Mixed fibers so it doesn’t shrink.  The colors of the flowers are not overly bright but just right.  Looks just like the picture and fits wonderful.  I like my tshirts big so I ordered a 2xl.  I  could have easily worn an xl which is my normal size.  You won’t regret this one.
true to size and a very nice shirt

This is a pretty t-shirt.  The t-shirt is well-made with good stitching (no wonky seams or loose threads).  The material is soft which makes the t-shirt comfortable to wear.  I ordered an XX-Large which is slightly big (I am 5’ 7”, 130ishpounds, 36D).  I wanted to make sure it would fit would my chest (I need 44”) and it does (with a couple of inches to spare).  The flowers are well-done.  They look so delicate.  The flowers really pop on the blue.  I like the cuffed sleeves (gives the t-shirt a feminine look).  It washes up beautifully (comes out soft and without wrinkles).  This is a lovely t-shirt.
